Package it.polimi.se2018.controller.effects.checkMethods.checkConstraintMethods

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CheckConstraint
    ConstraintChecker Interface This interface is used to call all constraint checker
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CheckDieNoColorConstraints
    CheckDieNoColorConstraints Class implements CheckConstraint This class verifies if is possible to apply a card respecting color die constraints
    CheckDieNotAdjacency
    NotAdjacencyChecker Class implements CheckConstraint This class verifies the not adjacency of die
    CheckDieNoValueConstraints
    CheckDieNoValueColorConstraints Class implements CheckConstraint This class verifies if is possible to apply a card respecting value die constraints
    CheckDiePlacement
    CheckDieConstraints Class implements CheckConstraint This class verifies if is possible to apply a card respecting die constraints
    CheckNotAdjacent
    AdjacencyChecker Class implements CheckConstraint This class verifies the adjacency or not of a die inserted after the application of a ToolCard
    ChooseCheckConstraint
    ConstraintCheck Chooser Class This class allows tho chose the correct ConstraintCheck method for the ToolCard to apply
    TestCheckDieNoColorConstraints
    CheckDiePlacement Tester This class tests if a die has no color
    TestCheckDieNotAdjacency
    CheckDieNotAdjacency Tester This class tests if a die is not adjacent to another one
    TestCheckDieNoValueConstraints
    CheckDieNoValue Tester This class tests if a die has no value
    TestCheckDiePlacement
    CheckDiePlacement Tester This class tests if a die has been correctly placed
    TestCheckNotAdjacent
    CheckNotAdjacency Tester This class tests the not adjacency checks works properly
    TestChooseCheckConstraint
    ChoseCheckConstraint Tester This class tests if has been chosen the correct constraints checker
